Text: Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ hi tinyo̩ me̩;
Ma kʼamonu gugu jo̩, o̩wo̩-mi muda dʼef uwñ n.
O̩mokuno̩-we̩ mʼe̩ du tinyo̩ me̩, O Samaria.
Todu i chaka chʼe̩wñ-i, ugbo Israe̩l i kwo;
Todu ma du afu ki aju gbe̩,
Ochochi, dagba ma chaka faya ef abo uche̩ichi,
Todabu kʼIfraim fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ che, kʼugbo kʼama adure ki wewe nyo̩gba,
Omi fʼe̩wñ uko̩-o̩la-mi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gwa le̩ ko̩ nyʼe̩wñ tod uwñ,
I chʼe-e̩wñ ku ma ko wa akpa chʼiche̩bo̩ ñw mi le̩,
